unnormalised: Guys, Delhi Traffic Police are at it again! New regulations rolling out faster than you can say "biryani on a Sunday." Apparently, they're cracking down hard on signal jumping near AIIMS. Fine's now a whopping Rs. 5000, chaps!
normalised: Guys, Delhi Traffic Police are at it again! New regulations rolling out faster than you can say "biryani on a Sunday." Apparently, they're cracking down hard on signal jumping near A I I M S. Fine's now a whopping rupee five thousand, chaps!

unnormalised: Word on the street (or should I say, the highway?) is they're also focusing on lane discipline on the Gurgaon-Faridabad road. Think you can just weave through traffic like it's Onam Pookkalam? Think again! Expect heavy challans for that.
normalised: Word on the street (or should I say, the highway?) is they're also focusing on lane discipline on the Gurgaon-Faridabad road. Think you can just weave through traffic like it's Onam Pookkalam? Think again! Expect heavy challans for that.

unnormalised: Sources say they're planning to use more AI-powered cameras to catch offenders. No more dodging the cops with your fancy number plate, eh?
normalised: Sources say they're planning to use more A I-powered cameras to catch offenders. No more dodging the cops with your fancy number plate, eh?

unnormalised: Also, mandatory rear seatbelt rule is being strictly enforced on the Yamuna Expressway. Seems like they're finally taking safety seriously, folks. Buckle up, back benchers!
normalised: Also, mandatory rear seatbelt rule is being strictly enforced on the Yamuna Expressway. Seems like they're finally taking safety seriously, folks. Buckle up, back benchers!

unnormalised: Heads up if you're heading towards Bangalore University; diversions due to road work until next week. Add an extra 30 mins to your commute, trust me.
normalised: Heads up if you're heading towards Bangalore University; diversions due to road work until next week. Add an extra thirty minutes to your commute, trust me.

unnormalised: Let's try and follow the rules, yeah? Less stress, less fines, more delicious biryani. Drive safe!
normalised: Let's try and follow the rules, yeah? Less stress, less fines, more delicious biryani. Drive safe!
